headline: Equity Residential to Participate in Citi 2026 Global Property CEO Conference
summary: CHICAGO, February 27, 2026--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR) today announced that members of the Company’s senior management team, including the Company’s President and CEO, Mark J. Parrell, will participate in a roundtable presentation at the Citi 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on Tuesday, March 3, 2026 at 11:00 a.m. ET. The event will be web cast live. A link to the web cast will be available in the Presentations section of the Investor section of the Company’s website at www.equityapartmen
